Skin Cleansing Compositions    [0028] The composition of the invention is especially one which is used to cleanse the skin. It generally contains high amount of surfactant. The surfactant is preferably an anionic surfactant e.g. an alkyl sulphate and/or ethoxylated alkyl sulfate surfactant. The composition may comprise one or more further anionic cleansing surfactants which are cosmetically acceptable and suitable for topical application.
